jobDescription: Software Developer Intern We are looking for Software Developer Interns enrolled in a Masters Degree Program with a start-up attitude to help build our product vision. This exciting role will require someone who cleverly possesses the following skills:Experience of building web applications using LAMP architecture. This will require excellent knowledge of PHP5 OOP and MySQL5 and its surrounding technologiesBroad interest and experience in other programming languages including PythonCode in HTML5 and CSS3 to W3C standards, WAG accessibility, cross-platform compatibility and semantic coding would be highly regardedExperience with Javascript and JqueryAPI experience, including integration and API design would be very impressive (we are a bit fanatical about APIs)Experience developing scalable web applications for high-volume sites is also highly desirablePassion for Open Source technologies, active participation in the Open Source Community is very telling (in a positive way). Apply Now
